title: Altered functional brain activity in first-episode major depressive disorder treated with electro-acupuncture: A resting-state functional magnetic resonance imaging study
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): XiaoLing Wang, Ping Luo, Ling Zhang, JiFei Sun, JiuDong Cao, Zhang Lei, Hong Yang, XueYu Lv, Jun Liu, XiaoYan Yao, ShanShan Li, JiLiang Fang
